column2: visually separate DUMMY_IDENTIFIER text from the main text

column3: PS Also more zzz might need to be added at the end. ;)

Unfortunately, this change breaks completion in about 10 languages we support, and an unknown amount of third-party plugins. Some languages treat underscore differently from uppercase letters, so parse trees there could change.
Yeah, you are right. Already seen "IntellijIdeaRulezzz" string hardcoded inside CMake plugin bandled with Clion...
separate DUMMY_IDENTIFIER from the main text
